attributes.action: Protect all healthcare workers from Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: To protect healthcare workers to become infected so they can continue to provide care for all the citizens.
attributes.background: For the protection of staff during the pandemic by providing adequate personal protective equipment and allow them to wear them in all medical units across the country. At the moment there are wards and nursing homes imposing nurses not to wear masks in order not to scare their patients.
